report.title: Locations list - Dunescape
report.description: A general purpose list of Dunescape locations.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms t on t.id=l.location_type_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND (l.public=true or lw.website_id in (#website_ids#)) AND l.deleted=false #order_by#

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include

param.name: intersects
param.description: Geometry to filter to locations intersecting with as WKT, Web Mercator projection
param.where: st_intersects(l.boundary_geom, st_geomfromtext('#intersects#', 900913)) and not st_touches(l.boundary_geom, st_geomfromtext('#intersects#', 900913))

param.name: parent_id
param.description: ID of the parent site to filter to

column.name: edit_link
column.sql: CASE l.location_type_id WHEN 17804 THEN '' WHEN 777 THEN 'edit' WHEN 17805 THEN 'edit' WHEN 17806 THEN 'edit' WHEN 17807 THEN 'edit' END
